short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track BETFIN token price in real-time directly from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BETFIN Price Tracker is a simple tool for monitoring the BETFIN token price.

Key features:
- Real-time BETFIN token price display directly in the extension icon
- Detailed price view in the popup window
- Direct access to BETFIN Academy with comprehensive platform information
- Customizable price update intervals
- Minimalist design for easy use

Dots before a number correspond to the number of zeros before the decimal point for the minimalistic number. (long numbers cannot be displayed in Chrome icon)
When hovering over the icon, the full value is visible.

The extension uses CoinGecko API to ensure accurate price information.

Get instant overview of your BETFIN token and stay informed about current developments in the BETFIN ecosystem.

This extension is free.
